ing: 4 frozen BanquetÂ® Brown 'N Serveâ„¢ Turkey Sausage links, sliced
2 cups refrigerated shredded hash brown potatoes
n: Potato, Sausage and Egg Breakfast Casserole
des: "An easy breakfast recipe of shredded hash brown potatoes, Egg BeatersÂ®, sausage, red bell pepper and Cheddar cheese baked together."
ins:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Spray 8x8-inch glass baking dish with cooking spray; set aside.
Combine Egg Beaters(R), milk and garlic salt in large bowl. Add sausage, potatoes, bell pepper and cheese; stir to combine. Place mixture in dish.
Bake 45 minutes or until knife inserted in center comes out clean. Cool slightly before serving.
